attributes.action: Birkenhead Park to stage an open music festival
attributes.additional_details: Birkenhead Park would be an excellent venue to stage a "world class" music festival.  Birkenhead Park was opened on Easter Monday 5 April 1847 by Lord Morpeth and is regarded by some historians as the world's first public park, and was also one of the UK's first municipal green spaces. I feel that this venue would be ideal for the area and would bring a boost for the region and establish Birkenhead as a front-runner  for pop concerts.

rejection.details: One to take up with the local Authority.
